import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { useMode } from '../contexts/ModeContext'; import { Search, Briefcase, Users, TrendingUp, Shield, Zap, UserPlus, Compass, PlusCircle, LayoutDashboard } from 'lucide-react'; import AnimatedBackground from '../components/layout/AnimatedBackground'; const companyLogos = [ '/assets/companies/peloton.svg', '/assets/companies/roblox.svg', '/assets/companies/airtable.svg', '/assets/companies/postmates.svg', '/assets/companies/doordash.svg', '/assets/companies/nerdwallet.svg', '/assets/companies/plaid.svg', '/assets/companies/ifttt.svg', ]; const Home = () => { const { isAuthenticated } = useAuth(); const { mode } = useMode(); const features = [ { icon: , title: 'Smart Job Search', description: 'Find jobs that match your skills and preferences with our intelligent matching algorithm.' }, { icon: , title: 'Easy Job Posting', description: 'Post job openings quickly and reach qualified candidates in your industry.' }, { icon: , title: 'Talent Pool', description: 'Access a diverse pool of talented professionals from various industries.' }, { icon: , title: 'Career Growth', description: 'Track your career progress and discover opportunities for advancement.' }, { icon: , title: 'Secure Platform', description: 'Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security and privacy measures.' }, { icon: , title: 'Fast & Efficient', description: 'Streamlined processes for quick job applications and hiring decisions.' } ]; const stats = [ { number: '10K+', label: 'Active Jobs' }, { number: '50K+', label: 'Job Seekers' }, { number: '5K+', label: 'Companies' }, { number: '95%', label: 'Success Rate' } ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{mode === 'company' ? 'Hire top startup talent' : 'Where startups and job seekers connect'}

{mode === 'company' ? 'Post jobs, manage applicants, and find your next great hire.' : 'Find your next hire or your next job. Discover unique opportunities at top startups and tech companies.'}

{/* Redesigned Action Buttons */}
{mode === 'company' ? ( <> Sign Up as Company Post a Job Company Dashboard ) : ( <> Sign Up as Job Seeker Find Jobs My Dashboard )}
Explore Campaigns Create Campaign
{/* Company Logos */}
{companyLogos.map((src, i) => ( ))}
{/* Why Job Seekers Love Us */}

Why job seekers love us

💬
Direct connection with founders
No third party recruiters. Connect directly with decision makers.
💰
Transparent offers
See salary, stock options, and more before you apply.
⚡
One-click apply
No cover letters. Your profile is all you need.
🌟
Unique opportunities
Find jobs you won't see anywhere else.
{/* Why Recruiters Love Us */}

Why recruiters love us

👥
10M+ startup-ready candidates
Tap into a huge, engaged talent pool.
🛠️
All-in-one recruiting tools
Post jobs, manage applicants, and brand your company for free.
🤖
AI-powered matching
Let JobNest AI find and schedule the best candidates for you.
{/* Testimonials */}

From our users

"I got my tech job on JobNest 4 years ago and I'm still happy! Pays well, great culture, and unlimited PTO."
- Sarah, Software Engineer
"Half of the offers I give are sourced from JobNest. It's the best product for anyone looking for startup talent."
- Michael, Recruiter
"I love JobNest. I got my current job at a startup entirely through the site last year - it's super easy to use and I love the UI."
- Priya, Product Manager
); }; export default Home;
